name: Space Itself: A Strange Solar Science
name_original: Space Itself: A Strange Solar Science
description:
Take a trip across the multiverse and vibe in the cosmos!

(Maybe Rick Astley needs saving?)

Touchscreen Controls:

Tap and hold to move around space

Double tap to move through dialogue

Mouse & Keyboard Controls:

WASD to move around space

Shift to drift up / Space to drift down

Click and hold to move around space

Double click to move through dialogue  

-

Made in 6 weeks by the Tinderbox Online Games Club
